thread.title: Strange mash-up: 'Pride and Prejudice and Zombies' trailer released
thread.title_full: Strange mash-up: 'Pride and Prejudice and Zombies' trailer released

title: Strange mash-up: 'Pride and Prejudice and Zombies' trailer released
text:
Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
The parody mash-up that was one of the first horror, classical combinations, "Pride and Prejudice and Zombies," now has a trailer for the upcoming movie. 
The Seth Grahame-Smith book that turns the Jane Austin classic "Pride and Prejudice" on its ear then eats it, will hit the big screen on Feb. 5. 
>> Read more trending stories 
But before then, here's a glimpse of the love and gore from the retelling. What better way to get in the mood for #WorldZombieDay , than with the FIRST LOOK at PRIDE AND PREJUDICE AND ZOMBIESüëç https://t.co/sixvksmkkg
